title: Remove connection error UI blocking main app access

requirements.summary: Remove BackendConnectionGate wrapper from App.tsx to prevent connection diagnostics from blocking dashboard and application modules
acceptanceCriteria: Users can immediately access the dashboard without seeing connection error messages
No connection diagnostics UI, retry buttons, or error messages are displayed
The main app (dashboard and other modules/modals) renders directly without being blocked

file_operations.description: Remove the BackendConnectionGate import statement and unwrap the router children from the BackendConnectionGate component, leaving AuthApprovalGate and AppErrorBoundary wrappers intact. Ensure the RouterProvider and all routes remain functional without the connection gate layer.

requirements.summary: Delete the BackendConnectionGate component file since it is no longer used
acceptanceCriteria: The BackendConnectionGate.tsx file is deleted from the codebase
No unused imports or references to BackendConnectionGate remain

file_operations.description: Delete the BackendConnectionGate.tsx component file as it is no longer referenced or used in the application.
